chapter.text: 'iidha alshams luffat wadhahab daw'uha, wa'iidha alnujum tnathrt, fdhhb nwrha, wa'iidha aljibal syirt ean wajah al'ard fsart hba'an mnbthana, wa'iidha alnwq alhwaml turkt wahmlt, wa'iidha alhayawanat alwahshiat jumet wakhtltt; lyqtss allah min bedha lbed, wa'iidha albihar awqdt, fsart ealaa eizamha narana ttwqd, wa'iidha alnufus qurnt bamthalha wnzayrha, wa'iidha altflt almdfwnt hayatan suylt yawm alqiamat swal ttyyb laha wtbkyt lwaydha: bay dhanb kan dfnha? wa'iidha suhuf al'aemal eurdt, wa'iidha alsama' qulet wazylt min mkanha, wa'iidha alnaar awqdt fadrimt, wa'iidha aljanat dar alnaeim qurribt min 'ahliha almtqyn, 'iidha waqae dhlk, tyqnt wwjdt kll nafs maa qddamt min khayr 'aw shr

'idha alshams luffat wadhahab daw'uha, wa'iidha alnujum tnathrt, fdhhb nwrha, wa'iidha aljibal syirt ean wajah al'ard fsart hba'an mnbthana, wa'iidha alnwq alhwaml turkt wahmlt, wa'iidha alhayawanat alwahshiat jumet wakhtltt; lyqtss allah min bedha lbed, wa'iidha albihar awqdt, fsart ealaa eizamha narana ttwqd, wa'iidha alnufus qurnt bamthalha wnzayrha, wa'iidha altflt almdfwnt hayatan suylt yawm alqiamat swal ttyyb laha wtbkyt lwaydha: bay dhanb kan dfnha? wa'iidha suhuf al'aemal eurdt, wa'iidha alsama' qulet wazylt min mkanha, wa'iidha alnaar awqdt fadrimt, wa'iidha aljanat dar alnaeim qurribt min 'ahliha almtqyn, 'iidha waqae dhlk, tyqnt wwjdt kll nafs maa qddamt min khayr 'aw shr

aqsm allah taealaa bialnujum almkhtfyt anwarha nharana, aljariat walmsttrt fi abrajha, wallayl 'iidha 'aqbil bzlamh, walsubh 'iidha zahar dyawh, 'iina alquran latblygh rasul krym- hu jbryl ealayh alslam-, dhi quat fi tanfidh ma ywmr bh, sahb mkant rafieat eind allh, ttyeh almlaykt, mwtmn ealaa alwhy aladhi yunazil bh

'uqsim allah taealaa bialnujum almkhtfyt anwarha nharana, aljariat walmsttrt fi abrajha, wallayl 'iidha 'aqbil bzlamh, walsubh 'iidha zahar dyawh, 'iina alquran latblygh rasul krym- hu jbryl ealayh alslam-, dhi quat fi tanfidh ma ywmr bh, sahb mkant rafieat eind allh, ttyeh almlaykt, mwtmn ealaa alwhy aladhi yunazil bh

wma muhamad aldhy terfwnh bmjnwn, walaqad ra'aa muhamad jbryl aldhy yatih balrsalt fi al'ufuq alezym, wama hu bbkhyl fi tblygh alwhy. wama hdha alquran biqawl shaytan rjym, mtrwd min rahmat allh, wlknh kalam allah wwhyh

fayn tadhhab bikum eqwlkm fi altkdhyb bialquran baed hadhih alhujaj alqate? ma hu 'iilaa maweizat min allah lajamie alnas, liman sha' minkum 'an yastaqim ealaa alhaqi wal'iyman, wama tshawwn alastqamt, wala taqdarun ealaa dhlk, 'iilaa bmshyyt allah rabu alkhlayq ajmeyn
